statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT last_name, first_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_since DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_since > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address, customer_since FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, birth_date FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY birth_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_orders ON customers.customer_id = customer_orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_total_amount, MIN(total_amount) AS min_total_amount FROM customer_orders
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE first_name = 'John' AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE DATE(interaction_date) = '2022-01-10';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
